subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez fouled a ball off his left big toe on Monday and had X-rays taken.  Rodriguez, who went 0 for 2 after entering Tuesday night’s game in the seventh inning as a pinch-hitter, said he would be back at third base on Wednesday.
snippet: Alex Rodriguez fouled a ball off his left big toe on Monday and had X-rays taken.  Rodriguez, who went 0 for 2 after entering Tuesday night’s game in the seventh inning as a pinch-hitter, said he would be back at third base on Wednesday.
